53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying, The people will be assembled in three categories. Those desirous (of Paradise), fearing (Hell), coming two upon the came], three upon the camel, four upon the camel, ten upon the camel and the rest will be assembled, Hell-Fire being with them when they are at midday where they would spend the night and where they would spend the morning and where they would spend the evening

chapter.ara-name: باب فَنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا وَبَيَانِ الْحَشْرِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Passing Away Of This World, And The Gathering On The Day Of Resurrection
